name: kittendiscord
description: Kittenlocks Discord Rich Presence integration for Chaster

scripts.build: npm run prepare && pkg --compress Brotli --out-path dist .
scripts.build:ci: npm run prepare && pkg --compress Brotli -t node18-alpine-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-linuxstatic-x64,node18-macos-x64,node18-win-x64 --out-path dist .
scripts.build:arm: npm run prepare && pkg --compress Brotli -t node18-linux-arm64,node18-linuxstatic-arm64,node18-win-arm64 --out-path dist .
scripts.build:arm-alpine: npm run prepare && pkg --compress Brotli -t node18-alpine-arm64 --output  dist/kittendiscord-alpine-arm .
scripts.build:arm-macos: npm run prepare && pkg --compress Brotli -t node18-macos-arm64 --output  dist/kittendiscord-macos-arm .

author: Silizia
